summary: I'm not an anti. What Rian confirmed is believable, I'm just hoping you have a source for it. On his twitter? I feel better...
question: I'm not an anti. What Rian confirmed is believable, I'm just hoping you have a source for it. On his twitter? I feel better using this info with a source so antis won't be making accusations about lying.
answer:
This post? (x)

That was an old post (from Feb 2018) that somehow became popular recently, but it’s referring to the Collider Q&A interview with Rian (x). I also answered an ask about it here: (x).

summary: Kind of marveling at the irony of fans claiming that ‘The Force Awakens’ and ‘The Last Jedi’ misrepresent what Star Wars is...
body:
Kind of marveling at the irony of fans claiming that ‘The Force Awakens’ and ‘The Last Jedi’ misrepresent what Star Wars is because…

- Rey is good at stuff for no reason

- the casino sequence serves zero purpose

- Luke Skywalker attempts to murder Ben

- it needs to “keep politics out of it”

reblog.comment:

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

blog.name: swpromptsandasks
blog.title: StarWars prompts and asks
blog.description: Send me your best (weird, nsfw and cute) prompts and asks for Star wars and if they contain Obi-Wan then hurray for me. Lets see what we can drum up. (I don't write for the last trilogy, apologies)

summary: Hello Moddy! Hope you've catchen up some sleep on your break. Thnak you for the Masterlist of fics! So since Chancellor Jin is...
question: Hello Moddy! Hope you've catchen up some sleep on your break. Thnak you for the Masterlist of fics! So since Chancellor Jin is on the list, could we see more of it please? How is the relationship with Obi going now that the Jedi have allowed them to stay together? Do they warm to the idea that Jedi are allowed to love and can have some attachs outside the Order?
answer:
Running his fingertips slowly between the freckles of the other mans skin, Qui-Gon smiled at the others back as he felt the steady heartbeat of a sleeping person and heard his slow breaths. Obi-Wan was resplendent in his sleep, comfortable and warm as he let himself relax in the arms of the Chancellor.

And Stars, did Qui-Gon love him for it.

The sounds of skycars were slowly becoming louder with the rise of the sun and yet Qui-Gon did not move as he switched from tracing freckles to writing words of endearment on the pale skin that glowed golden under the rising sun from the window.

Some days, his duties as the Chancellor as the Republic required a great many sacrifices, demanded him to rise early and leave the warmth of the bed.

But for this day… he’d stay for as long as Obi-Wan slept or until someone came knocking as it was rare Obi-Wan remained the night now.

Oh he tried and yes the Jedi and the Council had not removed him from Qui-Gon but…

They couldn’t push their luck too much, not with Anakin caught between it all.

So Qui-Gon treasured the nights Obi-Wan stayed in his bed and slep in his arms, resting his head on Qui-Gon’s breast or visa verse. It didn’t matter to Qui-Gon who cradled or who was cradled as long as he had Obi-Wan by his side.

Chuckling softly as his love finally twitched a bit, Qui-Gon raised himself up on his elbow to lean in close and press a kiss to his cheek softly. “Wake beautiful love, its time to greet the day.” He whispered into the redhead’s ear.

Mewling unhappily, Obi-Wan cracked open an eye then sighed and opened both to pout at him. “I was having a good dream…”

Humming a bit, Qui-Gon rubbed their noses together. “Its a good dream when we’re together. Forgive me love but its time to start the day and you were waking and as much as I’d love to laze about, we have duties,” He reminded with a warm rumble. Only to outright giggle when Obi-Wan whined and tried to tug the pillow up over his head. “Obi-Wan honestly, didn’t you say you had lessons to go over with Anakin today?” Qui-Gon playfully tickled at the others stomach.

Squeaking and rolling out of bed onto all four, Obi-Wan scuttled towards the fresher, bare bottom in the sun. “Ah! No tickles!” He cried out, laughter stuck in his voice.

“Then you best behave, won’t you dear one?” Qui-Gon smirked, drawing out of the bed to leave the sheets a mess as he followed Obi-Wan. “Now, lets shower, have breakfast and then you will have to depart I’m sorry to say as I head to the Rotunda.” He rolled his eyes.

Laughing, Obi-Wan drew into the fresher with Qui-Gon rounding up behind him. “Time to argue with the Trade Federation again?” He teased, turning on the fresher for it to warm up as he indulged in a water shower for them.

“And the Scipio delegates too.” Qui-Gon grumbled. “If there’s anything I hate its to argue about finances with muuns.” He sighed as he let Obi-Wan draw him into the shower.

Sniggering, Obi-Wan tugged him down via his hair into a very brief kiss to avoid the morning breath. “At least you know the muuns won’t try to cheat you, unlike certain neimodians.” He teased as he grasped for the shampoo to start cleaning the long tresses

“Well, there is that,” Qui-Gon mused, sighing in pleasure as he ducked further down to allow Obi-Wan the ease of washing his hair. “Oh that feels divine.” He mumbled contently while sliding his arms around Obi-Wan’s wet waist.

“Hopefully the memory will carry you through the long meeting.” Obi-Wan hummed.

It was a beautiful, warm and wonderful moment.

Neither could ever have anticipated the darkness that came later that day nor how their lives would hang in the balance.

They couldn’t push their luck too much, not with Anakin caught between it all.

So Qui-Gon treasured the nights Obi-Wan stayed in his bed and slep in his arms, resting his head on Qui-Gon’s breast or visa verse. It didn’t matter to Qui-Gon who cradled or who was cradled as long as he had Obi-Wan by his side.

Chuckling softly as his love finally twitched a bit, Qui-Gon raised himself up on his elbow to lean in close and press a kiss to his cheek softly. “Wake beautiful love, its time to greet the day.” He whispered into the redhead’s ear.

Mewling unhappily, Obi-Wan cracked open an eye then sighed and opened both to pout at him. “I was having a good dream…”

Humming a bit, Qui-Gon rubbed their noses together. “Its a good dream when we’re together. Forgive me love but its time to start the day and you were waking and as much as I’d love to laze about, we have duties,” He reminded with a warm rumble. Only to outright giggle when Obi-Wan whined and tried to tug the pillow up over his head. “Obi-Wan honestly, didn’t you say you had lessons to go over with Anakin today?” Qui-Gon playfully tickled at the others stomach.

Squeaking and rolling out of bed onto all four, Obi-Wan scuttled towards the fresher, bare bottom in the sun. “Ah! No tickles!” He cried out, laughter stuck in his voice.

“Then you best behave, won’t you dear one?” Qui-Gon smirked, drawing out of the bed to leave the sheets a mess as he followed Obi-Wan. “Now, lets shower, have breakfast and then you will have to depart I’m sorry to say as I head to the Rotunda.” He rolled his eyes.

Laughing, Obi-Wan drew into the fresher with Qui-Gon rounding up behind him. “Time to argue with the Trade Federation again?” He teased, turning on the fresher for it to warm up as he indulged in a water shower for them.

“And the Scipio delegates too.” Qui-Gon grumbled. “If there’s anything I hate its to argue about finances with muuns.” He sighed as he let Obi-Wan draw him into the shower.

Sniggering, Obi-Wan tugged him down via his hair into a very brief kiss to avoid the morning breath. “At least you know the muuns won’t try to cheat you, unlike certain neimodians.” He teased as he grasped for the shampoo to start cleaning the long tresses

“Well, there is that,” Qui-Gon mused, sighing in pleasure as he ducked further down to allow Obi-Wan the ease of washing his hair. “Oh that feels divine.” He mumbled contently while sliding his arms around Obi-Wan’s wet waist.

“Hopefully the memory will carry you through the long meeting.” Obi-Wan hummed.

It was a beautiful, warm and wonderful moment.

Neither could ever have anticipated the darkness that came later that day nor how their lives would hang in the balance.

blog.name: swpromptsandasks
blog.title: StarWars prompts and asks
blog.description: Send me your best (weird, nsfw and cute) prompts and asks for Star wars and if they contain Obi-Wan then hurray for me. Lets see what we can drum up. (I don't write for the last trilogy, apologies)

summary: Heyla Moddy!  I love what you write!  And I note that TheSandTrap is on hiatus?  Might I request the continuation of that au,...
question: Heyla Moddy!  I love what you write!  And I note that TheSandTrap is on hiatus?  Might I request the continuation of that au, perhaps with the police intercepting Maul and his bomb, and the resulting shootout solving the problem?  Whatever you write will delight!
answer:
Letting out a little noise as Anakin carefully lifted him out of the passenger seat and into his wheelchair, Obi-Wan glanced about in utter delight at finally being back at the Sand Trap. He had honestly missed this place since his kidnapping, hospitalization and recovery and now to be back was an utter treat and it was clear from the small smile Anakin sported as he fussed with the blankets covering Obi-Wan’s legs that he knew how much his lover appreciated it. “We’re only going to stay about two or three hours, mom says we can eat lunch here, you can write if you want or we can talk to friends and then we’re going home, alright?” Anakin murmured.

It grated a bit but Obi-Wan understood, nodding slightly as he let Anakin wheel him in once everything was settled.

The moment they were in however Ahsoka jumped over the counter and rushed over, wrapping Obi-Wan in a tight hug. “You’re here! I missed you Obi-Wan!” She beamed down at him when she pulled back, the togrutas lekkus twitching in delight.

Another voice called his attention however which prevented him from answering Ahsoka. “Hey Ben, long time no see.”

Laughing, Obi-Wan looked around the young lady to grin at Cody, giving him a little wave. “Hey right back at you Codes, I didn’t know the cops had a new haunt.” He teased as Anakin wheeled him over after a short order of tea and coffee to Ahsoka which she eagerly went to get.

Shrugging a bit, Cody leaned back in the chair with a smile. “Its a nice place, me and Rex drop by here of then enough now and so do Kit and Aayla. Even seen a few muffin boxes from the Sand Trap in Windu’s office.” He chuckled warmly.

Snorting a bit, Obi-Wan gave him a wry smile in return. “You know the major has a sweet tooth even if he hides it.” Obi-Wan and Cody launched into new and old news, totally forgetting about Anakin who did not mind at all.

No, the blond had stepped back after placing down Obi-Wan’s tea and a plate of scones and stood at the counter to chat with Ahsoka occasionally while watching his healing lover talk animatedly with his friend.

It was obviously nice for him to see, Obi-Wan utterly lost in a conversation, not glancing about in worry or tucking himself down to hide as he sometimes did after Maul’s abduction when they were out.

Obi-Wan felt safe in Shmi’s cafe.

It warmed Anakin’s heart over.

()()()

Yellow eyes glittered madly as he pick locked the door open, teeth exposed in a demented smile as the door clicked and then slid open quietly.

Snatching the bag of the ground, the man slid into the dark and musty apartment only to sneer at the picture of a long haired man cradling a redhead teen in his arms on the table right in the entrance hall and with a vindictive smirk on the mans face, he sent the photo flying to the ground with a jerk of his hand.

The image shattered, the two smiling humans staring up unknowingly through broken glass as the red and black skinned man continued further into the apartment, breaking yet another picture though this time of the redhead an adult with a blond man.

Across the hall, another heard the sounds of broken glass in what should be an empty apartment.

A call to the police was sent out moments later, all unknowing of what was happening in what should have been an empty apartment.
